TEXT.TITLE: POEHL SEES GOOD CHANCES FOR CURRENCY STABILITY
TEXT.BODY: Bundesbank president Karl Otto Poehl said there were good chances for exchange rate stability. "The chances for exchange rate stability are good," he told reporters. Reuter
